Looking to join an existing team instead? Log In
Whether it’s your cloud file storage, task management, or communication tools, integrate Lokalise with thousands of other apps on Zapier to automate your workflow.
Try all features for 14 days · No credit card required
Or sign up with your email

Our goal is to eliminate the hassle of localization by providing tools to automate, integrate, and better manage your translations. Lokalise is a better way for growth-minded businesses to expand their mobile apps, games, software or digital content into multiple languages.
